context: Hello i'm open to any movie
I like old school horror movies like A Nightmare on Elm Street (1984) have you ever seen this one?

The second one A Nightmare on Elm Street 2: Freddy's Revenge (1985) is great too.
i watched The Exorcist (1973) and it scared me
so are there two movies? haha, i would not say the same i enjoyed It (1990) the old one i think the old one is better than the new one
There are more than two, A Nightmare on Elm Street 3: Dream Warriors (1987) , A Nightmare on Elm Street 4: The Dream Master (1988) , and A Nightmare on Elm Street 5: The Dream Child (1989) .
Ooh, i will try them thank you for helping me good bye

A Nightmare on Elm Street 4: The Dream Master (1988)

resp: I loved It (1990) and I thought the new one It (2017) was ok thank you, good bye.
